title: Elegant Japan Escape near Toyama Castle
description: Only a short distance from Toyama Castle, ANA Crowne Plaza Toyama is a stylish refuge in the heart of this storied city. Offering elegant design and fine dining, this hotel will tempt you with traditional cuisine at Unkai Restaurant, or seduce you with seasonal dishes at the sun-soaked Cafe in the Park restaurant. As the sun sets, head to the top-floor Sky Bar Astral to pair a sophisticated cocktail with stunning views of the Toyama cityscape.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Toyama, an IHG Hotel
